SQL_STMT_U.val: select MQDT_DEPT_CODE, MQDT_USRID, MQDT_MQTY_ID, MQDT_LINENO from :1/MQDT where MQDT_MQTY_ID in (99, 136) and MQDT_INVO_NO in (:2, :3) for fetch only

Text.val: -- Taks use DSQL to avoid problems with lost records which are deleted in BMQ010
... step 99A as last part within step 99 to minimize the risk of locks on CMON

ExpSyntax.val: 'The clientmanager has removed schedulenumber '&Trim(Str({11,4},'5'))&' of Client '&Trim(Str({2,4},'4'))&'/'&Trim(Str({2,5},'5'))&' Remove this line with the button Delete and store the copy-invoice again in the archive.'
